Note: For another MS see 3417; for the version in the ‘expanded’ Cycle see 4189.
_description: Story of Mary Magdalene: a Narratio in the Northern Homily Cycle

BodAsh42.First Lines:
Werldli welthe gerte marye wede Whiles scho was ȝonge in hir
                    fayrehede…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Amen saye we now all samene ffor þare es endeles Ioye
                    and gammen

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
WOrldus weole Made Marie wedeWhil heo was child in hire
                    feirhede…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Þat may ȝe lerne wiþ oute fableBi a Beest
                    vnresonable

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
ffor werldes welth gert hire do synfull dedeWhiles sche was
                    ȝonge in hire fayr hede…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…And saue vs on þat dredfull dayAnd graunte vs þat
                    blisse þat lastes ay

CULGg531.First Lines:
Warldys welth gert mary wedeWhyls scho was yang in here fayre
                    hede…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…Amen I rede we say all samenffor þare sall be endles
                    gamne
CULGg531.Note:
‘Narratio’ in this MS marked eight lines earlier than
                    first line as here; so for this scribe the narratio began at ‘Namely be
                    mari mawdelayne…’.

BLAdd22283.First Lines:
WOrldes weole Made Marie wedeWhil heo was child in hir
                    feirhede…
BLAdd22283.Last Lines:
Þat may ȝe lerne withouten fableBi a best
                    vnresonable

BLAdd30358.First Lines:
Werldes welth gart mary weideWhyls scho was ȝong in hyr fayr
                    heide…
BLAdd30358.Last Lines:
…Amen Amen say we all samenffor þat sall be oure endles
                    gamon

BLAdd38010.First Lines:
Worldes welth gert mary wedeWhyles sho yonge was in hir
                    barnede…
BLAdd38010.Last Lines:
…Amen say we all sammenFfor þat schall be oure endlese
                    gamen

Lam260.First Lines:
WErldly welth gert mary wedeWhyles scho was ȝong in hyre
                    farhed…
